subject: The Skinny: Thurs. April 19, 2007
body:
CBSNews.com

  The Early Show | CBS Evening News | 48 Hours | 60 Minutes | The Saturday Early Show | CBS Sunday Morning | Face The Nation 





Abortion Becomes A Campaign 
Issue 
The Supreme Court's decision to uphold a ban on some abortions 
      dramatically alters the parameters of the abortion debate and immediately 
      injects the issue into the 2008 
      presidential race. 
And how did you survive the 
      great BlackBerry blackout of 2007?
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's headlines.  More... 
 

Joel Robertstheskinny@cbs.com
